long_description: With an adaptable and smart-looking design, the REI Snowcrest parka offers 3 levels of protection. Wear the shell with the liner, wear only the shell or wear only the liner. REI Elements(R)-rated nylon shell is breathable, waterproof and windproof up to 60 mph. Hood has front and back volume adjustments to preserve vision, and hood's faux fur trim can be zipped on or off. Bonded placket protects 2-way front zipper and keeps wind from moving through; rip-and-stick closures secure placket. 1-hand-adjustable drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs seal in warmth. Pit zippers let excess heat escape; articulated arms enhance mobility and minimize hem lift when arms are raised. Shell has 2 snap-flap/zip handwarmer pockets and 2 snap-flap chest pockets; interior zip chest pocket has a cord port. Insulated liner jacket features cuffs with stretch binding, a 1-hand-adjustable drawcord hem, zippered hand pockets and an interior pocket with cord port. Polyfill synthetic insulation stays warm even when damp; Snowcrest liner's back length is 25.5 in. Liner is windproof to 50 mph. With the liner jacket zipped into the shell you'll get maximum protection and warmth; or wear either piece separately as climate conditions dictate. REI Snowcrest parka has a classic, easy-wearing fit.
short_description: With an adaptable and smart-looking design, the REI Snowcrest parka offers 3 levels of protection. Wear the shell with the liner, wear only the shell or wear only the liner.
